effects.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the area gains the following effects: - Once as a free maneuver at the start of your turn, you allow yourself and each ally in the area to spend any number of Recoveries. - The area is difficult terrain for enemies. - Each enemy who enters the area for the first time in a combat round or starts their turn there takes damage equal to your Reason score.
The area remains until the start of your next turn. As a maneuver, you can move the area up to 5 squares. This ability ends if the area is ever not within your line of effect.
